name: Catch-Tap
description:
Catch-Tap is a hypercasual rythm game when you as a cube need to match every side with his respective color of arrow :D

Controls: Rotate right --> D      /         Rotate left-->A

Game Version: Alpha v0.0.4

Gameplay video:
